rule_description: Declines the application if the applicant does not meet the minimum legal age required to apply for credit.
decision_logic_summary: Fail if applicant_age is less than 18; pass otherwise.
failure_reason_template: Applicant does not meet the minimum legal age requirement.
regulatory_reference: Minimum legal age for credit contracts
confidence_notes: Age is treated as a deterministic eligibility attribute with no exceptions.
typical_remediation: Reapply once the minimum age requirement is met.

rule_description: Declines the application if the applicant is currently flagged as receiving financial hardship assistance or equivalent support.
decision_logic_summary: Fail if hardship_flag is true; pass if hardship_flag is false.
failure_reason_template: Applicant is currently flagged as receiving financial hardship assistance.
confidence_notes: This is a hard eligibility rule with no overrides or manual review permitted.
typical_remediation: Resolve hardship status and reapply once assistance has ceased.

rule_description: Declines the application if the applicant does not have a valid residential address within a supported jurisdiction.
decision_logic_summary: Fail if is_valid_postcode is false or is_supported_region is false; pass only when both are true.
failure_reason_template: Applicant does not have a valid residential address within a supported jurisdiction.
confidence_notes: This rule is evaluated prior to any bureau or servicing checks and does not rely on external credit data.
typical_remediation: Update residential address details and apply using a valid domestic address.

rule_name: Invalid Visa or Insufficient Visa Term
rule_description: Declines the application if the applicant’s visa subclass is unsupported or if there is insufficient time remaining on the visa, based on verified visa attributes.
decision_logic_summary: Fail if visa_subclass is in the unsupported visa list or months_remaining_on_visa is less than 12; pass only when visa_subclass is supported and months_remaining_on_visa is at least 12.
failure_reason_template: Applicant does not meet visa eligibility requirements due to an unsupported visa subclass or insufficient remaining visa term.
regulatory_reference: Visa eligibility and minimum remaining term policy
confidence_notes: Unsupported visa subclasses are treated as policy configuration. Visa verification is assumed upstream and only verified attributes are consumed. Rule is deterministic and versioned.
typical_remediation: Reapply once visa status changes to a supported subclass or when sufficient time remains on the visa.

rule_description: Declines the application if the applicant’s estimated monthly income is insufficient to cover declared liabilities, living expenses, and the proposed loan repayment.
decision_logic_summary: Fail if net_surplus (income minus expenses, liabilities, and proposed repayment) is less than 0; pass if net_surplus is greater than or equal to 0.
failure_reason_template: Applicant does not have sufficient monthly surplus income to service the proposed loan.
confidence_notes: Uses conservative expense assumptions to ensure the applicant can maintain a reasonable standard of living.
typical_remediation: Increase income, reduce existing liabilities or expenses, or apply for a lower loan amount.
